page.title: 15Industry
page.content: There is one major activity in this area of importance, and that is {agriculture.}Some of the steeper slopes possess small grass fields which are used for{horses,}the rest of the area is used for either{cattle}or {crops.}This area is all part of what was once a huge estate, and many of the farmers are{tenants.}An exception to agriculture is a large sand{quarry found in the north of this area. There is evidence of quarrying in other parts of the study area but all of these do not appear to have been used for over 40 years or so. A problem which the present quarry creates is {noise}and{air pollution}from the large lorries which transport the sand from the quarry along the narrow lanes.
